entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or thunderstorms. High 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers or a few thunderstorms beginning early this morning. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming north 20 then south 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High 20. Humidex 25. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind becoming west 30 km/h this evening then light after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
